Description:
CloudFormation template for secure financial services application infrastructure.
Includes Networking, IAM, Storage, Security, Serverless, DNS, CDN, Messaging,
and Monitoring components, all compliant with financial-grade security standards.

Environment.Description: The deployment environment (e.g., dev, staging, prod).

Project.Description: The name of the project this infrastructure belongs to.

Owner.Description: The owner or team responsible for this infrastructure.

RDSDatabaseName.Description: The name of the RDS PostgreSQL database.

RDSDatabaseUser.Description: Master username for the RDS PostgreSQL database.

RDSDatabasePort.Description: Port for the RDS PostgreSQL database.

LambdaFunctionName.Description: Name for the example Lambda function.

S3BucketName.Description: Name for the secure S3 bucket for static content.

CloudFrontPriceClass.Description: The price class for the CloudFront distribution.

KMSKeyAlias.Description: Alias for the KMS Key used for encryption.

RDSKMSKeyAlias.Description: Alias for the KMS Key used for RDS encryption.

Properties.Description: Stores the master password for the RDS PostgreSQL database.
KMS Key for general application encryption (S3, EBS, etc.)

Statement.Sid: Allow use of the key by authorized services
Allow S3 to use the key for encryption

Properties.Description: KMS Key for RDS database encryption.

Statement.Sid: Allow RDS to use the key for encryption

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for RDS PostgreSQL instance.
Security group for Lambda functions in VPC.
Security group for internal instances (no public access, no SSH/RDP).

HostedZoneConfig.Comment: Private Hosted Zone for internal financial application services.

CloudFrontOriginAccessIdentityConfig.Comment: OAI for S3 bucket access via CloudFront.

Properties.Description: Checks if RDS DB instances are publicly accessible.

VPCId.Description: The ID of the newly created VPC.

RDSEndpointAddress.Description: The endpoint address of the RDS PostgreSQL instance.

RDSSecurityGroupId.Description: The Security Group ID of the RDS instance.

SecureS3BucketName.Description: The name of the secure S3 bucket.

CloudFrontDistributionDomainName.Description: The domain name of the CloudFront distribution.

FinancialProcessorLambdaArn.Description: The ARN of the Financial Processor Lambda function.

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the DynamoDB table.

SNSTopicArn.Description: The ARN of the SNS Topic.

ApplicationKMSKeyArn.Description: The ARN of the application KMS Key.

RDSKMSKeyArn.Description: The ARN of the RDS KMS Key.

WAFWebACLArn.Description: The ARN of the WAF WebACL.
